## Hello World!
I am **Sina Azad** (which means "free"), a postdoctoral researcher specializing in cancer epidemiology, prevention, early detection, and surgery. My work integrates innovative epidemiological and clinical research to advance cancer prevention strategies and improve patient outcomes.
